item.title: 10 Post Ideas for When You Need a Blog Post Like, Yesterday
item.description:
10 Post Ideas for When You Need a Blog Post Like, Yesterday

Dear God, the pressure!

So … despite your best intentions, you didn’t write your blog post and now that deadline is breathing down your neck like a toddler in the row behind you on an airplane: sticky, vaguely threatening, driving all rational thought out of your head.

item.title: You Can't Hack a Relationship
item.description:
You Can't Hack a Relationship

So what do you do? 

So imagine you’re out somewhere, all dolled up in your Sunday-go-to-meeting best, and suddenly, you see them — the person that fits right into your daydreams of riding off into the sunset and “Til death do us part”. You want them — bad.

item.title: My Post-Sabbatical Confession
item.description:
My Post-Sabbatical Confession

But I have a confession to make. 

Over the past few weeks I’ve been on sabbatical — the perfect time to do some great thinking about the direction I want for my life, to actually do all of the courses I’ve downloaded over the past year, and of course, to follow through on all the beloved online entrepreneur Christmas traditions of vision boarding, reverse engineering my ideal business year, and doing a planathon or two to get ahead of the jump.
